review.review_text: This looked like it had nice clear tracking graphs, but unfortunately when it says it's compatible with the Health App, it means it can send information to it but not receive it, so you need to enter eg your weight manually all the time, even if your scales are already linked to your phone.
L'application est trÃ¨s bonne en temps normale mais elle plante toujours quand on veut entrer la grandeur. Ã‡a fait Ã§a depuis la derniÃ¨re mise a jour!!!!

Love this app... However, it's gotta be a different way to see the dates when I input the weight. The only way I can see them, it's by changing the weight and looking at the graph. What if I don't change my weight?Instead of "last week", should be a date. Also, "from the beginning", should also be the date you started. Some dates would be great... Then i would give it 5 star app. Thanks
This app us great! I am trying to lose weight and seeing my progress on this app definitely helps keep me motivated!
Seems good so far. I like the graph idea...

This is a great app for keeping track of weight, especially if you're losing weight. There should be a way to turn off daily reminder to weigh. Also I notice it keeps changing the year I was born. Fix those two things and this is a 5-star app.
Simple to use and very comfortable.
Very Straight forward, the graph gives you incentive. Very pleased :)
This is exactly what I was looking for. 5th star would of been for ability to share results / graph via email Facebook or twitter.
I like seeing the growth chart before and being able to conceptualize my weight gains and losses. Now it's all itemized and less user-friendly.
I am currently trying 5 new weight tracking apps. This one is easy to use, easy to read and not complicated. However, I have found a few others that I like better.
This is a fantastic app so simple ad does exactly what you need it tonsnjssh
It just works.
It's great to start measuring yourself and seeing the progression of the weight loss
Just began using app and already impressed! Love how easy it is to use.
I was looking for smth simple to track my weight, this app does even more ))
I can track weight, bmi, and whr. Love this app!
I wanted a simple, straight forward app to use to track my weight. This does just that. ðŸ˜Š

review.review_title: Isn't the greatest thing for the metrics
review.review_text: I count kgs and cms, and must say this app it's not customized for those AT ALL although it says so. In general it needs to be worked on a bit more. Despite my 2 stars on this app, I'll keep it anyway (:
Great way to track weight loss!
